description.jp:
アルケイディア帝国の司法機関ジャッジ
をまとめるジャッジマスターのひとり。
冷静な武人といった態度の裏で 祖国
を守れなかったことを後悔しており
自分と母を捨てた兄を恨んでいる。
政治的な事情から のちに権力を失うも
最後まで信じる主君のために命をかけた。
description.gl: One of the Judge Magisters of the Archadian Empire. Behind the appearance of a composed warrior lies a man who rues his inability to protect his homeland and despises the older brother who abandoned him and their mother. Despite losing his authority to politics、 he would till the end risk his life for his sworn master.

jp.text: どれほどあがこうが\n人は過去から逃れられん！
力なき者に未来はない\n何物も守れはしない
俺はジャッジマスターだ
守りたいものほど守れはしない\n違うか！
野良犬にも意地はあるのだ！

gl.text: No、 we cannot escape the past.
Yet without power、 what future can you claim?
Tell me: why do you forsake that which you must hold most precious?

name.jp: コールアビリティ_ガブラス

rank_up_desc.en: When using [Judgement (C)]\n• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV\n• [20% Attack Down], [20% Defense Down] duration +2
rank_up_desc.jp:
「ジャッジマント【C】」使用時
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分
・「攻撃力小ダウン」「防御力小ダウン」の2ACTION期間延長

name.jp: LDコールアビリティ_ガブラス

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Innocence (C)]
• Becomes 6-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack delivered twice (40*12)
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
• Call Effect duration +3
rank_up_desc.jp:
「イノセンス【C】」使用時
・8HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃が
　6HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を2回行うに変化
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分
・使用後特殊効果の3ACTION期間延長

desc.en: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 近距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.en: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.en:
2-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + ST HP attack
Self: 3 turns [Judge Magister]

When attacking target afflicted with [Criminal's Mark] or [Outlaw's Brand]
• Target: 3 turns 20% [ATK Down], 20% [DEF Down] 

When party party takes BRV or HP damage while [Judge Magister] is active
• Attacking enemy: 6 turns [Criminal's Mark], [Judgment]
desc.gl:
2-hit group melee BRV attack + single-target HP attack
All targets: 3 turns ATK Down I and DEF Down I while target afflicted with Criminal's Mark or Outlaw's Brand
Self: 3 turns Judge Magister
When any party member attacked with BRV or HP attack while Judge Magister active:
 • Inflicts 6 turns Criminal's Mark, Judgment on attacking enemy (once per turn)
desc.jp:
2HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋単体HP攻撃
ターゲットに「罪人の証」または「重罪人の刻印」が付与されている時
敵全体に3ACTION「攻撃力小ダウン」「防御力小ダウン」付与
自身に3ACTION「ジャッジマスター」付与
「ジャッジマスター」付与中
味方がBRV攻撃またはHP攻撃を受けた時
その敵に6ACTION「罪人の証」「ジャッジの裁き」付与
1回の行動での弱体効果付与は1回のみ

desc.en:
[Circle of Judgment] use +3

When using [Circle of Judgment]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 4
• Increases total BRV potency by 120%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
• Increases party's BRV by 20% HP damage dealt
• [20% Attack Down], [20% Defense Down] duration +3
• [Judge Magister] duration +3

While [Judge Magister] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ 2-HIT melee BRV attack (90*2)
　∟ Target: 6 turns [20% Attack Down], [20% Defense Down] if afflicted with [Criminal's Mark] or [Outlaw's Brand]
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]
　∟ 2-HIT melee BRV + HP attack (40*2)
　∟ Target: 6 turns [20% Attack Down], [20% Defense Down] if afflicted with [Criminal's Mark] or [Outlaw's Brand]
